meaningMnemonic: In your <radical>fingers</radical> are <radical>flowers</radical> which really <radical>suit</radical> you. But you throw them to the people waving to you from below, as you <kanji>board</kanji> your ship. The flowers fall, unneeded. You're <kanji>embark</kanji>ing on a new life, a new journey. There will be more flowers where you're going.
readingMnemonic: You <kanji>board</kanji> a ship to <reading>とう</reading>きょう, bound for your new life, of course!
